message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate you offering the product to me. While I'm very interested, I'm hoping to secure a better price.  Considering the value I place on this product, I'd be willing to pay $1,100,000. This is a fair price that considers your needs and my budget. I'm confident we can find a mutually agreeable solution.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $1,150,000. This is a fair price that takes into account the value you place on the product, as well as my own needs. I believe this is a mutually beneficial offer and look forward to hearing your thoughts.
